title: Population of Minnesota , by race and ethnicity 2018
summary: This statistic shows the Population of Minnesota , distinguished by Some_other_race_alone and Hispanic_or_Latino_(of_any_race) origin in 2018 .
In 2018 , about 363,600 people in Minnesota were Hispanic_or_Latino_(of_any_race) or .

data.Race: American Indian and Alaska Native alone
Native Hawaiian and Other Pacific Islander alone

gold: This statistic shows the population of Minnesota , distinguished by race and Hispanic origin in 2018 . In 2018 , about 4.46 million people in Minnesota were white and not of Hispanic or Latino origin .
